DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether D961H sachet 20 mg bioequivalent D961H HPMC capsule 20 mg follow repeat oral dos , evaluate safety tolerability two formulation healthy male Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Comparing D961H Sachet D961H Capsule Japanese Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase I , Open-label , Randomized , Single-center , 2-way Crossover Bioequivalence Study Comparing Pellets Based Sachet Formulation D961H 20 mg Commercial HPMC Capsule D961H 20 mg After Repeated Oral Administration Japanese Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedures 2 . Japanese healthy male subject age 20 45 year age 3 . Body Mass Index 1927 kg/m2 body weight 5085 kg 4 . Clinically normal finding 5 . Classified homoEM ( extensive metabolizers ) accord genotype CYP2C19 1 . Significant clinical illness 2 . Past present cardiac , renal , hepatic , neurological gastrointestinal disease 3 . Clinical significant condition could modify absorption investigational product 4 . Past present severe allergic disease , hypersensitivity food drug , allergic symptom require medical intervention
